unnormalised: EV Charging Gets a Festive Boost in India!
normalised: E V Charging Gets a Festive Boost in India!

unnormalised: Hey petrolheads, ditch the fumes – electric is getting easier! With Onam around the corner, folks are planning long drives, and guess what? EV charging infrastructure is finally catching up, even in Kerala!
normalised: Hey petrolheads, ditch the fumes – electric is getting easier! With Onam around the corner, folks are planning long drives, and guess what? E V charging infrastructure is finally catching up, even in Kerala!

unnormalised: IIT Madras just announced a cool new charging tech that's supposedly way faster and cheaper. Think less time plugged in, more time enjoying that delicious Onam Sadhya.
normalised: I I T Madras just announced a cool new charging tech that is supposedly way faster and cheaper. Think less time plugged in, more time enjoying that delicious Onam Sadhya.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Ather Energy is expanding its charging grid across South India, aiming for near-ubiquity by Diwali. Forget range anxiety, think biryani breaks!
normalised: Meanwhile, Ather Energy is expanding its charging grid across South India, aiming for near-ubiquity by Diwali. Forget range anxiety, think biryani breaks!

unnormalised: There's even talk of subsidies making home chargers more affordable – imagine waking up to a fully charged car every morning!
normalised: There is even talk of subsidies making home chargers more affordable – imagine waking up to a fully charged car every morning!

unnormalised: Tata Power is also aggressively rolling out chargers along the Mumbai-Pune expressway.
normalised: Tata Power is also aggressively rolling out chargers along the Mumbai-Pune expressway.

unnormalised: The government is pushing for a minimum of one charging station every 25 km on major highways.
normalised: The government is pushing for a minimum of one charging station every twenty five kilometer on major highways.

unnormalised: So, are you ready to trade in your petrol guzzler for an EV? The future's electric, ya'll, and it's looking brighter (and cleaner) every day.
normalised: So, are you ready to trade in your petrol guzzler for an E V? The future is electric, ya'll, and it is looking brighter and cleaner every day.
